feature: 4K Ultra HD Action Camera: Featuring 20MP stunning color images and up to 4K 24fps Ultra HD Videos, AKASO Brave 5 action camera captures you well-detailed imagery down to every detail of your wonderful outdoor adventures.

Waterproof Camera without Case: AKASO Brave 5 waterproof camera is waterproof to 33ft (10m) without case. This underwater camera is also equipped with a solid waterproof case, which allows you to dive as deep as 30 meters. It is ideal for extreme sports such as surfing, diving etc.

2 Inch Touch Screen: Integrated 2" touch screen makes control of this tiny but powerful action camera super easy. It is more convenient and fun for you to preview and playback your shots, change settings.

4K Ultra HD Action Camera: Featuring 20MP stunning color images and up to 4K 24fps Ultra HD Videos, AKASO Brave 5 action camera captures you well-detailed imagery down to every detail of your wonderful outdoor adventures.

Waterproof Camera without Case: AKASO Brave 5 waterproof camera is waterproof to 33ft (10m) without case. This underwater camera is also equipped with a solid waterproof case, which allows you to dive as deep as 30 meters. It is ideal for extreme sports such as surfing, diving etc.

2 Inch Touch Screen: Integrated 2" touch screen makes control of this tiny but powerful action camera super easy. It is more convenient and fun for you to preview and playback your shots, change settings.

Built-In WIFI & HDMI: Share & edit videos and images easily. Just download App(MioCam) on your phone or tablet and connect with this action camera. Wi-Fi signal ranges up to 10 meters. HDMI output allows videos display on the TV.
Longer Battery Life: AKASO Brave 5 action camera comes with 2 rechargeable 1050mAh batteries. Each battery can record up to 90 minutes. No more worry about the recording time for this action camera.
